title: The Dow Added 37 Points Because Some Trade Tariffs Are on Hold and So Is the Market
text:
Holding Steady. Stocks ended Friday largely flat despite more positive news on trade. China said it would exempt some U.S. farm products from increased tariffs. President Donald Trump also hinted that he might consider an interim deal with China. Retail sales in August were stronger than expected, consumer sentiment also came in solid. In today’s After the Bell, we...

wonder what has been lifting stocks over the past three weeks; check how the retail sector did in August; and explain the undercurrents of consumer sentiment among different political groups.

...
description: Stocks ended Friday largely flat despite more positive news on trade. China said it would exempt some U.S. farm products from increased tariffs. President Donald Trump also hinted that he might consider an interim deal with China.
